name: Give Gold
description: We are suffering great poverty after being robbed by [civName], and unless we receive a sum of Gold, it's only a matter of time before we collapse.

name: Clear Barbarian Camp
description: Barbarian's have been threatening our village for far too long! Stop them at once!

name: Connect Resource
description: Seeing that there may be [tileResource] nearby, I recommend you add that to your society.

name: Contest Culture
description: The civilization with the largest Culture growth will gain a reward.

name: Bully City State
description: We are tired of [cityState]. If someone were to put them in their place by Demanding Tribute from them, they would be highly rewarded...

name: Denounce Civilization
description: We have been forced to pay tribute to [civName]! We will appreciate you if you denounce this world power.

name: Spread Religion
description: You must spread the word of [religionName]. Send your missionaries to teach the world about your religion.
